text: 39|36|taṉ aṭiyārukku (vēṇṭiya utavi ceyya) allāh (oruvaṉē) pōtumāṉavaṉāka illaiyā? (Napiyē!) Avarkaḷ (taṅkaḷ teyvaṅkaḷākiya) allāh allātavaṟṟaip paṟṟi uṅkaḷai payamuṟuttukiṉṟaṉar. (Atai nīr poruṭpaṭutta vēṇṭām.) Evaṉai allāh tavaṟāṉa vaḻiyil viṭṭu viṭukiṟāṉō, avaṉai nērāṉa vaḻiyil celuttakkūṭiyavaṉ oruvaṉumillai
